attributes.action: Prevent automated recorded voice phone calls unless from a subscribed service.
attributes.additional_details: Vulnerable people are being targeted in this way by scammers. Messages such as 'Your internet will be cut off in 1 hour, Press 1 to order a new router' (Customer then starts to be charged an extortionate amount for the call)and, 'Your National Insurance number is being used fraudulently' etc are regularly received in most households.
attributes.background: Make it illegal for anyone, company or individual, to arrange for people to contacted by phone where an automated message is played, which tries to prompt an action . (Not to include signed up for, subscription services, such as medical appointment reminders and information from an employer)

rejection.details:
It is up to individual businesses, not the Government, whether to use recorded phone call services, or have people make calls on their behalf.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to ban unsolicited phone calls of any kind, if that's something you would like to happen.
